notes.text:
This update for libxslt fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-30560: Fixing a use after free vulnerability in Blink XSLT (bsc#1208574).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Use after free in Blink XSLT in Google Chrome prior to 91.0.4472.164 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
